reviewText: Such a pleasure to watch musicians singing and dancing and not having to grab their crotch, snarl at the camera or swear to either get the attention of their audience or cover up their own ineptitude.

I bought this for my 91 yr old mother, her vision is poor and in this case it's a blessing. The visual quality of this is the worst thing I have ever seen.  It is so grainy, it is blotchy. If the person using it can hear better than they see, go for it. If not, probably pass on it.
I watched the original shows as a kid and it is sad to see that the films have deteriorated to the point that they are now
My daughter,Karen loves Lawrence Welk and would watch it every day. So I'll rate it 5 stars for us.

Extremely poor viewing quality for 90 year old person, who this was purchased for. Grainy, low lighting, etc. I purchased this DVD, and others of various Lawrence Welk Episodes, due to seller presentation showing higher quality.
Love this!  Best ever fun and music!  I will watch this many times!

Talk about memories!  Watching now with my 95-year old mother as I used to do when I was 8 or 9 years old.  Mother actually danced with him at the Palladium 40 or 50 years ago. Thank you so much for offering this show as it brings delight to my sweet mother.
If you enjoy Lawrence welk you will like this CD.
enjoyed the music of these classic episodes
Interesting to watch and compare TV then and now.  It was a much more innocent time.  A lot of the numbers are pretty corny in today's context.
